attributes.action: Require schools to only be open 4 days of the week.
attributes.additional_details: This allows students to connect with their family more and also a mental break. 6+ hours inside of school 5 days a week can be mentally challenging. This could also improve attendance for schools as only 4 days are needed to be attended.
attributes.background: Require schools to only be open 4/7 days of the week.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Change the school week to a four day week:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
